title: Razorpay | SDE 2 Frontend | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 4.5 years
Previous Comp : 24LPA
Company: Razorpay
Title/Level: Senior Frontend Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 34 Lakhs
Signing Bonus: 1 Lakh
Retention: 1 Lakh
ESOPs: 20 Lakhs/4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 34 + 1 + 1 + 5  = 41 LPA
Benefits: Standard Razorpay Benefits

Although I was okay with the base, I felt like it was overall a lowball offer. Razorpay used to pay good signing bonus and retention bonus earlier (2-5 Lakhs each) but when I asked the recruiter about this, I was told they don't do it anymore. 

I did NOT accept the offer.
